entries.name: open(*args)
entries.desc: Creates a new DNS resolver.  See ::new for argument details.

entries.name: each_address(name)
entries.desc: Iterates over all IP addresses for name retrieved from the DNS resolver.

entries.name: each_name(address)
entries.desc: Iterates over all hostnames for address retrieved from the DNS resolver.

entries.name: each_resource(name, typeclass, &proc)
entries.desc: Iterates over all typeclass DNS resources for name.  See getresource for argument details.

entries.name: getaddress(name)
entries.desc: Gets the IP address of name from the DNS resolver.

entries.name: getaddresses(name)
entries.desc: Gets all IP addresses for name from the DNS resolver.

entries.name: getname(address)
entries.desc: Gets the hostname for address from the DNS resolver.

entries.name: getnames(address)
entries.desc: Gets all hostnames for address from the DNS resolver.

entries.name: getresource(name, typeclass)
entries.desc: Look up the typeclass DNS resource of name.

entries.name: getresources(name, typeclass)
entries.desc: Looks up all typeclass DNS resources for name.  See getresource for argument details.

entries.name: timeouts=(values)
entries.desc: Sets the resolver timeouts.  This may be a single positive number or an array of positive numbers representing timeouts in seconds. If an array is specified, a DNS request will retry and wait for each successive interval in the array until a successful response is received.  Specifying nil reverts to the default timeouts:
